Class ruclinicscheduler.Scheduler

java.lang.Object
ruclinicscheduler.Scheduler
public class ruclinicscheduler.Scheduler extends Object
This is the ruclinicscheduler.Scheduler class, the user's way of controlling appointments. Handles user commands, with read, write, and update. Within the ruclinicscheduler.Scheduler, we are able to: 1. Create an appointment, based on provider availability and duplicates 2. Cancel an existing appointment 3. Reschedule an existing appointment, if provider is available 4. Print appointments sorted by patient name, location, or date 5. View billing records for each unique patient
Author:
Varun Doreswamy, Yuet Yue

  • Method Details

    • processCommand

      private void processCommand(String input)
      Process the line by calling getInput Finds the case, depending on command, that is split from arguments. Calls, respective helper function to complete task Does nothing if invalid commands are entered or empty line for ""
      Parameters:
      input - used to generate command and arguments

    • getInput

      private void getInput(String input)
      This method split the command from the arguments, if arguments exist. Sets the command and arguments to respective global variable.
      Parameters:
      input - input is separated into command and arguments

    • handleNewAppointment

      private void handleNewAppointment(ruclinicscheduler.Appointment newAppointment)
      This adds a new appointment to clinic, if it exists and is valid. Handles error cases where an appointment cannot be booked.
      Parameters:
      newAppointment - is used to add new appointment to clinic (ruclinicscheduler.List)

    • handleCancel

      private void handleCancel(ruclinicscheduler.Appointment cancelAppointment)
      This method cancels an existing appointment (if valid) and in ruclinicscheduler.List
      Parameters:
      cancelAppointment - used to remove appointment from list

    • handleReschedule

      private void handleReschedule()
      This method reschedules an appointment based on provider availability

    • handleBillingStatements

      private void handleBillingStatements()
      This method shows the total charges for each patient. The order of the patients are by last name.

    • run

      public void run()
      The Run method for managing the scheduler terminal program. Here, process command is called for each line entered in terminal.
